column1: Little Goat Diner////The nice surprise was parking was a plenty and free! Walked in
column2: gave our name and phone number and headed to the washroom. I counted about six empty tables so while there probably was a good reason for the wait
column3: the perception was...why exactly do we have to wait 20 minutes during my hour long lunch break? Side note
column4: big fan of the wall papered doors and hand dryers in the bathrooms.
